structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Petition for establishment of sewer construction district.
law.text: The county judge/executive of any county in which a metropolitan sewer district has been established, upon petition of twenty-five percent (25%) of the resident freeholders therein may establish a sewer construction district for the purpose of providing sewers and/or drainage facilities to serve the district. The petition shall describe the territory intended to be included in the district, and the sewer and drainage conditions and facilities existing in this territory.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 204, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1952.
